title: Make the core Accountables.namedAccountable function public
description: Accountables has a number of methods named namedAccountable.  The core one of these works by taking a snapshot with an anonymous Accountable.  This method is currently private due to concerns over safety.  However, I think we should make it public, and document the how safety can be achieved (which is by only using that and the other namedAccountable methods).

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.content: Looks great. Thanks for fixing the docs: they are currently buggy.
